createOrg.intro: The fastest is to start with the twitter account of your organisation (if you have several, pick one)
createOrg.manual: Switch to fill the details manually

export.csv_help: CSV is the standard format. Use this unless you specifically need JSON.
export.errorIncomplete: There was an error, CSV data incomplete.
export.errorPermission: You do not have permission to export data for this organisation.

exportType.activities_help: Exports actions taken by users, such as signing, sharing, etc.

gdpr.double_opt_in_help: Supporters who confirmed their participation via email confirmation URL
gdpr.opt_in_help: Supporters who chose opt-on on a widget ('Yes, I want to receive emails' radio button)
gdpr.opt_out_help: Supporters who doesn't want to receive newsletter ('No, I do not want to receive emails' radio button on the widget or opt-out URL in the email.
gdpr.opt_out_required: *Please indicate that you are aware of consequences
gdpr.opt_out_warning: I am aware that it is illegal to contact users that didn't explicitly give consent unless very limited exceptions.

export.key_help: If your data is encrypted, load the encryption key before export.
export.title: Export member data

invite.default:
You're invited to join the {{org}} account on the Fix the Status Quo dashboard.

This invitation will be valid for the next 24 hours. Please accept it as soon as possible.

We're excited to have you on board!
invite.emailHelper: We'll send an invitation email with a link to join right away.

campaigner.description: Can view and manage actions, supporters, and campaign data. Cannot change organization settings or export data.
campaigner.label: Campaigner

coordinator.description: Can view supporter data but cannot create campaigns or manage settings, or export data.
coordinator.label: Coordinator

owner.description: Full administrative access. Can manage everything, including settings, campaigns, exports, and encryption.
owner.label: Owner

invite.sentInstructions: You can also share the link below directly:
invite.subject: Invitation to join {{org}} on the Fix the Status Quo dashboard
invite.title: Invite to join {{org}}
invite.tooltip: Note: Only 'owner' will be able to export the supporters data
invite.translator:
Hi,

We’re reaching out to invite you to collaborate on translating and refining a campaign letter for your country. Your understanding of the local political context would be valuable — not just in translation, but in ensuring the message resonates effectively with supporters.

The letter is structured in multiple sections, each with several variants. Supporters will receive randomly assembled versions to maximize engagement and avoid being dismissed by recipients.

As soon as you have accepted the invitation, you will be able to access the letter [here]({{location}}). **Don’t forget to save after you’ve made your changes!**

Once your contributions are complete, please notify us and the coordinator so we can deploy the updates.

We appreciate your time and expertise — this is a shared effort to strengthen the campaign’s impact.

**For security, your invitation access link will expire in 24 hours.**
invite.translatorTitle: Invite to join  {{org}} as a translator

join.goal: How many people do you expect will take action via your website?
join.goalHelper: This guess will only be seen by the coordinator… and we know it's hard to estimate
join.request: Do you plan dedicated mailing to your supporters? Are you also planning social media activities, including paid advertising
join.requestHelper: to help us plan this campaign

onboarding.done: You will receive a confirmation message by email. You can already embed a test version of the <1>widget on your website</1>
onboarding.embargoHelper: I acknowledge that the campaign materials are strictly embargoed until further notice. I agree to NOT SHARING these materials with anyone outside of my organisation.
onboarding.intro: To increase our impact, we need a broad coalition and we tried to make it as simple as possible to let you join it.
onboarding.login: Register as a user or login with your social media credentials or your email. It is your personal account, you will be able to set up your organisation after your register.
onboarding.maillingHelper: By submitting this form, I agree to be added to the {{campaign}} mailing list. I can unsubscribe at any time.

organisation.collectsEmail: You do not have a newsletter and don't want to collect email addresses? (You will be able to hide this feature yourself on your website) Tick this box:
organisation.collectsEmailHelper: I don't have a newsletter. I am sure I don't want a newsletter tick-box which collects email addresses that we can use afterwards.
organisation.crm: What CRM software are you using?
organisation.doubleOptIn: My supporters need to double opt in to receive newsletter
organisation.logged_in: You are logged in under {{orgName}} organisation account
organisation.network: My organisation is part of umbrella organisation...
organisation.organisationHelper: From which part of the family are you? We welcome all organisations!
organisation.remarks: Any comments about the tool you want to tell us?

onboarding.thanks: Thank you for joining this campaign
onboarding.title: Are you an organisation or social movement that wants to add this campaign on your site?
onboarding.verify: Your email  is not yet verified. Please check your email and click on the confirmation link to continue.

warning.is_coordinator: You cannot join a campaign under **{{org}}**'s account, it is the coordinator of the **{{campaign}}**
warning.is_member: You are a member of the organisation **{{org}}** that runs this campaign!

onboarding.welcome: Welcome to the partners' area for this campaign coordinated by {{coordinator}}
